extName.message: OurStickys - Sticky Notes on every page

extDescription.message: Add Persistent Sticky Notes anywhere on any web page, they will reappear when you re-open the page

newVersionAvailableQuestion.message: A new version of OurStickys is available. Do you want to update ?
newVersionAvailableQuestion.description: a new version of OurStickys has been found, does the user wants to update ?

copyToClipboard.message: To Copy to clipboard: Ctrl+C (Cmd-C for Mac), Enter

errorRefreshPage.message:
Ooops...
Please refresh the page to finish the installation of OurStickys.

Please be aware that chrome restrict the use of extensions on some google/chrome pages.
errorRefreshPage.description: The extension is not updated on the page

errorRefreshPageUpdated.message:
Ooops...
Seems like that a new version of OurStickys has been installed. Please refresh the page to complete the installation
errorRefreshPageUpdated.description: The extension is not updated correctly on the page

errorRefreshPageRestricted.message:
Ooops...
Seems like that Google Chrome has restricted the use of extensions on this page!
errorRefreshPageRestricted.description: The extension is not allowed to work on this page

questionDeleteNote.message: Are you sure you want to delete this Sticky ?
questionDeleteNote.description: question asked when delete is clicked

questionDeleteSharedNote.message: Are you sure you want to delete this shared Sticky ?
questionDeleteSharedNote.description: question asked when delete is clicked on a shared note

notePasswordProtected.message:
Password Protected
Click to enter password
notePasswordProtected.description: Shows inside the note when the note is password protected

notePasswordPrompt.message: Please enter the password for this Sticky

noteVideoEditInstructions.description: Video Sticky Type: how to edit instructions

notePasswordWrong.description: Shows when the user enters the wrong password

noteMinimize.description: hover text for the minimize button

noteMaximize.description: hover text for the maximize button

noteNotPinned.description: hover text for the pin button

notePinned.description: hover text for the un-pin button

noteDelete.description: hover text for the delete button

noteSettings.description: hover text for the Settings button

noteResize.description: hover text for the resize button

noteShared.description: hover text for the shared icon

previewLinkMouseOver.description: hover title for the a links

settingsShared.description: Text when the note is shared

showShadowLabel.description: Checkbox, if enabled, shadows will show on this sticky

settingsCreatedDate.description: Date when the note as created

shareInputPlaceholder.message: email to share this Sticky with

channelEmptyGoCreate.message: No Channels have been found.  Click here to create a new one
channelEmptyGoCreate.description: No channels found, click to create a new one

passwordInstructionsTop.message: Adding a password will allow you to hide the content of this sticky

passwordInstructionsBottom.message:
ATTENTION !!
if you lose the password you won't be able to retrieve it and you will only be able to delete the Sticky.

notePointerHover.message: click to go to this Sticky

popupNotLogged.message: You will not be able to sync OurStickys between different browsers because you are not logged in.

popupFinishInstall.message: Before you are able to add any sticky notes to this page you will need refresh the page to fully install the extension

popupMyStickyToThisPage.description: Popup page: Show the sticky to this page

popupSettingInstruction.message: The following settings will apply to all the newly created Stickys.
popupSettingInstruction.description: Popup page my stickys tab, nothing found

popupSettingEnableAdvanceFeatured.description: Popup page: checkbox, if enabled, advanced features will show up

popupSettingShowShadow.description: Popup page: checkbox, if enabled, shadows will show on the stickys

popupSettingEnableLiveUpdates.description: Popup page: checkbox, if enabled, user will receive live updates (always connected to the server)

popupSettingRefreshStickys.description: Popup page: refresh all the stickys on every tab

popupSettingExportStickys.description: Popup page: Export all the Stickys

popupCannotImportWrongFile.message: Cannot import! Please choose a different file

popupSettingDeleteAllStickys.description: Popup page: Delete all the Stickys

popupSettingDeleteAllStickysQuestion.message: Are you sure you want to delete ALL the Stickys that you created?
popupSettingDeleteAllStickysQuestion.description: Popup page: question about deleting ALL THE STICKYS

popupMyNotesNoFound.message: You do not have any stickys.  To add a Sticky right click on any page and choose "Add Stickys"
popupMyNotesNoFound.description: Popup page my stickys tab, nothing found

popupSharedNotesNoFound.message: You do not have any shared stickys.
popupSharedNotesNoFound.description: Popup page shared stickys, nothing found

popupHideAllNotes.description: Popup page hide all the stickys

popupShowAllNotes.description: Popup page hide all the stickys

popupChannelsCreateNameError.message: The name of the channel can only contain letters, spaces and numbers

popupChannelDelete.description: hover text for the delete channel button

popupChannelsDeleteQuestion.message: Are you sure you want to remove this channel from your list?
popupChannelsDeleteQuestion.description: Popup page: question about deleting channels where the user is not the owner

popupChannelsOwnerDeleteQuestion.message: Are you sure you want to delete this channel? This action will also remove the channel from all the other subscribers
popupChannelsOwnerDeleteQuestion.description: Popup page: question about deleting channels where the user IS the owner

popupChannelsSubscribe.description: Popup page: Subscribe to a channel (button)

popupChannelsCreateLabel.description: Popup page: Create a channel, channel name

popupChannelsRenameLabel.description: Popup page: Rename a channel, channel name

popupChannelsNotFound.message: Channel not found. Please try a different code
popupChannelsNotFound.description: Popup page: Channel Not Found Error

popupChannelsUser.description: Popup page: only one user in this channel

popupChannelsUsers.description: Popup page: Number of users per channel

popupChannelsSticky.description: Popup page: only one sticky in this channel

popupChannelsStickys.description: Popup page: Number of stickys per channel

popupChannelsCode.description: Popup page: the code of the channel

popupChannelsCodeClickToCopy.message: Click to copy the code to clipboard
popupChannelsCodeClickToCopy.description: Popup page: click to copy the code to clipboard

popupChannelsCodeCopiedClipboard.description: Popup page: alert message that the code has been copied to clipboard
